list.description: This sight is for #type10 #type_10 ,Japanese Version, Improved from @Nirrti and @Egoistic_Lily

#universal #sight #spaa #tank #tanks

Sights shown on M13MGMC (Universal_Simple_SPAA)
and also M5A1 Stuart (Universal_Simple_All)
Both sights are set up to be usable in any tank, spg, spaa, really any ground vehicle.
Tank sight has graduations from 400m to 2km, works very well for most situations when distance is set to 200m, as there's a small cross aligned with bore axis (0m distance), horizontal graduations are increments of 8, spaced apart for high visibility. Added also a small chevron from origin that extends 1 thou down and to either side, to aid in beyond-2km aim if your distance ...
This sight is for #type10 #type_10 ,Japanese Version, Improved from @BarteG98PL #m1abrams sight.

当前版本：2.15.1.22 这套自定义瞄具原作者是醉饭 由于长时间没有更新 本人只是帮忙更新一下并对其优化 。【这套瞄具的制作经过原作者同意】 由于新版本部分顶级载具的瞄具刻度尺有所改变 我也作出了一定部分的优化。【如果有任何问题可以向我反馈 邮箱:1745097470@qq.com】 此瞄具严禁用于任何商业用途 转载请说明出处 祝各位游戏愉快.
新增：以色列陆军全载具瞄具

Updated for Version 2.23 "Apex Predators"!

WAO (Waffenoptik) for the PUMA IFV, based on a video posted by the Bundeswehr on YouTube. The sight is mostly the same, although I did add a black frame to help when minimum zoom. I opted to not include information like the tank's speed and gun inclination as this would be purely graphical and have no function in-game. Personally I dislike how small the sight is when at minimum zoom, in real life the FCS would keep the sight the same size no matter the zoom level but in War Thunder...

#fv438 #fv102 #uk_fv102_striker #uk_fv438_swingfire #swingfire #greatbritain #great_britain #uk #historical #semihistorical #sights #reticles

This is the GPS & GPSE sight of the Swingfire missile launchers.

it is designed to be close to the historical sight.

Both sights have been combat-tested, but if you want to engage in long-distance combat, i recommend the GPSE version.

Since it is missile-only, the range measurement feature has been removed.
Either way, neither FV has a laser rangefinder.

I wanted to make a close combat hitpoint, but I couldn't guarantee accuracy, ...

Schindibee's fictional "SCOLIA" Sight package for M-51 variants

#customsight #sight #fictional #scolia #m51 #m_51

This is a fully fictional sight package for the Israeli M-51 (regular tree and premium) including the following easy to use features:

- Simplified ranging scale for main ammo (105mm HEAT and HE), up to 3'200 meters
- Ranging funnels configured for tank lengths of 7m (full line) and width of 3.5m (dotted line)
- Deflection shooting aim crosses for targets traveling at 20 km/h (inner) and 40 km/h (outer)
- Additional Stadiametric Rangefinder (optional: choos...

#7657

Meme Universal Sight using a slightly modified default UserSight, 0-6000m with 200m intervals.

Extract ZIP contents in UserSights folder, contents are as follows: /Rapscallion_Universal_Sight/all_tanks/*.blk
SketchUp file to edit the drawing: /Rapscallion_Universal_Sight/SketchUp/rapscallion.skp
Guide to edit SketchUp file: https://youtu.be/xvvTipG9_Ms

#meme #cat #kitty #rapscallion #universal #pink

This is "AAM version" of BF3 2S6/9K22 sight, in battlefield, this sight is shown when anti-air missle is toggled.
If you want "standard" sight, go here: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1027542/en/
Just like "standard sight" i posted, it has color like in bf, white for thermo, and yellowish kinda colour for daytime.
"Gun correction" is also available(file with gun correction will have "GUN_CORR" in name).

"Gun correction" version is available, file with gun correction will have "GUN_CORR" in name.
